text: oreāṟṟa sattayil ninn niṅṅaḷe sr̥ṣṭiccavanāṇavan. atil ninnutanne atinṟe iṇayēyuṁ sr̥ṣṭiccu. ā iṇayēāṭeātt santr̥pti nēṭān. avan avaḷe puṇarnnu. aṅṅane avaḷ garbhattinṟe laghuvāya bhāraṁ vahiccu. avaḷ atuṁ cumannu naṭannu. pinnīṭ atavaḷkk bhāramāyappēāḷ avariruvaruṁ taṅṅaḷuṭe nāthanāya allāhuvēāṭ prārthiccu: "ñaṅṅaḷkk nī nalleāru kuññine tarikayāṇeṅkil tīrccayāyuṁ ñaṅṅaḷennuṁ nandiyuḷḷavarāyirikkuṁ.”
